alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Walworth, southwestern Waukesha and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Atkinson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Mukwonago, East Troy, North Prairie, Palmyra, Potter Lake, Rome, La Grange, Eagle, Hebron, Genesee, Troy Center and Nws Milwaukee/sullivan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.
